scenes.visual_description: Close-up on a finger tapping a phone screen. Vibrant, digital comic book art style.  Screen glows with multiple filter/preset options: 'Retro', 'Cyberpunk', 'Fantasy', 'Noir'.

Split screen. Left side shows a dull, grey photo of a cat. Right side shows the same cat photo, now vibrant and stylized with the 'Cyberpunk' preset. Digital comic book art, electric blue and pink hues.

Rapid montage of various photos being transformed by different presets â€“ landscapes, portraits, food. Dynamic transitions, vibrant colors, digital comic book art style. Text overlays pop up with the name of each preset: 'Fantasy', 'Noir', 'Golden Hour'.
